Uses of Class
se.oidc.nimbus.claims.OidcScopeValue

Packages that use OidcScopeValue
Package
Description
se.oidc.nimbus.claims
Classes representing claims and scopes defined by OIDC Sweden.

  • Uses of OidcScopeValue in se.oidc.nimbus.claims

    Fields in se.oidc.nimbus.claims declared as OidcScopeValue
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final OidcScopeValue
    OidcScopeValue.ADDRESS
    Requests that access to address claim at the UserInfo endpoint be granted by the issued access token.
    static final OidcScopeValue
    OidcScopeValue.EMAIL
    Requests that access to the email and email_verified claims at the UserInfo endpoint be granted by the issued access token.
    static final OidcScopeValue
    ScopeConstants.NATURAL_PERSON_INFO
    A scope that defines a claim set that provides basic natural person information normally associated with a Swedish eID.
    static final OidcScopeValue
    ScopeConstants.NATURAL_PERSON_ORGANIZATIONAL_IDENTITY
    The “Natural Person Organizational Identity” scope requests basic organizational identity information claims about a person.
    static final OidcScopeValue
    ScopeConstants.NATURAL_PERSON_PERSONAL_NUMBER
    A scope that requests a Swedish civic registration number (personnummer) or a Swedish coordination number (samordningsnummer).
    static final OidcScopeValue
    OidcScopeValue.OFFLINE_ACCESS
    Requests that an OAuth 2.0 refresh token be issued that can be used to obtain an access token that grants access the end-user's UserInfo endpoint even when the user is not present (not logged in).
    static final OidcScopeValue
    OidcScopeValue.OPENID
    Informs the authorization server that the client is making an OpenID Connect request (REQUIRED).
    static final OidcScopeValue
    OidcScopeValue.PHONE
    Requests that access to the phone_number and phone_number_verified claims at the UserInfo endpoint be granted by the issued access token.
    static final OidcScopeValue
    OidcScopeValue.PROFILE
    Requests that access to the end-user's default profile claims at the UserInfo endpoint be granted by the issued access token.
    static final OidcScopeValue
    ScopeConstants.SIGN
    The scope has two purposes; it indicates for the OpenID Provider that the request in which the scope is included is a "signature request" and requests claims.
